text: Anyone from HubSpot company here? It's been 2 weeks to upload theme on new marketplace and still no feedback from anyone.  What approximate time it takes to get approved for themes?
It can take a hot minute sometimes. I imagine right now things are pretty swamped for them with the upcoming release of the new marketplace â€” everyone is likely resubmitting their themes
There is no fix timeline. It can take about a month to receive initial feedback from them. During one of my theme, it also took about 2 months to receive the feedback!
oh ok.. thanks guys.. I got reply from them last night lol
